user_query: in vegas at ten tomorrow morning okay spend some time with him free tonight and tomorrow but i just can't oh i know god i know he's asking about david [Music] where you hit las vegas let me see your ticket what time you got five through 11. there was a bus at 11 but now is nearly 12. seem like you put your watch back one too many times my friend there's no other bus there's no other boss i lost my husband lost him to drink but it was my fault we got ourselves an epidemic going on out there making up excuses all along the way it's facing up to the truth ain't always easy to get hurt that's my medication [Music] i'm not here at the moment leave a message and i'll call you back david david you're the one that i worry about the most i'm trying dad david tell me when i can see you robert dad wasn't on the bus did you look in the station i mean yeah of course i looked everywhere are you all right frank and i left my bottle of pills right on the edge of the same thing write a new prescription all right i have to come i have to come in although the garden is doing i'm looking right at it looking really good really good hello it's me are you home i'm waiting for you where are you told him not to tell you i was coming i told you [Music] welcome to megan's dad papa loves mambo that's why they call it a stretch big stage is what you always wanted are you happy very happy no this is an elevator very good wow you like it very you very impressive well do you want to see your room sure this
